HeroText.TITLE: Facundo Chiappero
HeroText.BODY: Programming technician, graduated from a technical school. Passionate about web development, specialized in frontend.

AboutText.TITLE: About me
AboutText.BODY1: I'm Facundo, I started programming at the age of 12 when I entered high school. I have knowledge in backend and database management, though I have more experience in frontend development.
AboutText.BODY2: Some of my most notable projects include the creation of the official website of my hometown museum during my internship and the development of a medical chatbot for a school project.
AboutText.BODY3: You can see more projects on my Github, some of which are not in this portfolio. These projects reflect my growth and learning in recent months.

gym.title: Gym
gym.name: Strength Training Instructor
gym.tasks: I worked as an instructor in a gym, teaching exercises to new clients. Although it was a short period, it significantly improved my ability to communicate clearly and effectively.

internship.title: Internships
internship.name: Graphic Archive Foundation and Historical Museum of San Francisco City and Region
internship.tasks: Design and development of the official website of the museum of San Francisco city, with a database and a user-friendly content upload system.

react.title: React 18 - Complete Course
react.name: Online React Course by Midudev
react.description: I completed the React course taught by YouTuber Midudev, where I learned the fundamentals of React, good development practices, and tools like Redux Toolkit.

programming.title: Programming Technician
programming.name: Graduated from the ProA technical secondary school
programming.description: I studied for 7 years in a technical secondary school specializing in programming, during which I learned various languages, including Python, HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, and SQL. I also developed soft skills such as teamwork and time management.

python.title: Python 3.7 - Complete Course
python.name: Online Python Course by pildorasinformaticas
python.description: I completed the Python 3.7 course taught by YouTuber pildorasinformaticas, where I learned everything from basic concepts like conditionals and loops to advanced topics like object-oriented programming.

chattinoai.title: ChattinoAI
chattinoai.description: A themed chatbot trained to interact with knowledge about the company Hololive.

google-translator-clone.title: Google Translator Clone
google-translator-clone.description: A clone of Google Translator, supporting 109 languages, using Google's Gemini AI.

random-users-dashboard.title: Random Users Dashboard
random-users-dashboard.description: A dashboard with multiple functionalities for random users, obtained via an API.

formiks-form.title: Formik's Form
formiks-form.description: A simple form developed with the Formik library, connected to a database.

chat-online.title: Online Chat
chat-online.description: An online chat with a simple login system, admin permissions, and a database.
